[[tabview]]
[[tab SCP Articles]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-7898" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-7898]]]**: W is for Walls
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Phase 2: The instance will break through the drywall from within, grab the head of the host, and use a sharp appendage to implant an egg in the host's ear.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-7320" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-7320]]]**: Serendipity [7000 Contest Entry]
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
The favorable events caused by these items are easily misconstrued as coincidence or confirmation bias, but specialized equipment confirms that the increase in â€œgood fortuneâ€ is in fact quantifiable.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-5320" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-5320]]]**: The People's Church of the Fish That Just Goes On Forever
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
SCP-5320 can be formally referred to as The Fish That Just Goes On Forever, Our Merciful and Long Lord, or Its Glorious Infinitude, Hail Its Everlasting Fish Body.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-5132" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-5132]]]**: The Kids Aren't Alright
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Okay, Rosie, if you had to rate your loyalty to the Foundation on a scale of one to five, where do you think that would be?
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-5732" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-5732]]]**: And I'm Thinking of What Sarah Said
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
What if I look really sick? Really sick like this? Ohh, Iâ€™m dying and I need a projector to watch Spiderman 2 for the 800th time or my dead body will be SUPER anomalousâ€¦
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-6320" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-6320]]]**: The Least Dangerous Extradimensional Rift
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
The Foundation wouldn't have a staff shortage in the first place if we put more effort into the safety of our personnel. We do what we do for the safety of humanity. You forget our people are human.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-6326" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-6326]]]**: The Manbear
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Colloquially known by locals as the "Manbear," SCP-6326 is often described as having a centaur-like build, with the upper torso, front legs and head of a bear attached to the shoulders of a white male human body.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-6322" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-6322]]]**: Special Delivery
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
I'm becoming increasingly certain that every last one of these poor fucks is going to die.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-6432" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-6432]]]**: Eye Eater
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Mobile Task Force Lambda-5 (â€œWhite Rabbitsâ€) was assigned to investigate but failed to return the anomaly
[[=]]
alive.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-32-j" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-32-J]]]**: The Criminal
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
On June 5, 2022, approximately 71% of Site-129 staff were reported or discovered comatose after posting SCP-32-J on Twitter. 
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-6k-j" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[SCP-6K-J]]]**: Out of the Mouths of Babes
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
SCP-6k-J was initially studied and contained by MTF Tau-4's ("A Real Life Preschool Class").
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[collapsible show="(here are the old doodles from when i didn't have no scps)" hide="shut"]]
[[image trash1]]
[[image trash2]]
[[image trash3]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]
[[tab Tales & Poems]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="working-dogs" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Working Dogs]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Comic

[[div class="blockquote"]]
I used to think  I was locked into the MTF stuff. When it was all ripped out from under me, I thought my life was over. 

But it wasn't over. It just felt like it. And eventually, it stopped feeling like it.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="shiny-gold-foil" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Shiny Gold Foil]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Prose

[[div class="blockquote"]]
It was fun. Harmless gossip about someone they all both feared and admired. She didnâ€™t seem real.

Not then, at least. She certainly felt real now.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="cherry-tree-branches-over-the-sun-roof" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Cherry Tree Branches Over the Sun Roof]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Prose

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Sanjana wished it hurt less.

She wished it hurt more.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="sonnet-for-unethical-practices" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Sonnet for Unethical Practices]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Sonnet

[[div class="blockquote"]]
I seek the haven past the airlock door,
in coat and collar white my love to meet.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="sonnet-for-a-place-to-die" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Sonnet for a Place to Die]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Sonnet

[[div class="blockquote"]]
We toil in proverbs not to fear the grave.
We must with boldness to the earth descend.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="ballad-for-a-faraway-disaster" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Ballad for a Faraway Disaster]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Ballad Poem

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Itâ€™s hard to keep your chin up
in a world this dark and cold.
You canâ€™t afford to care this much,
or so you're often told.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="dr-coolbad-destroys-the-economy" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Dr. Coolbad Destroys the Economy]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Prose

[[div class="blockquote"]]
â€œFuck the UN,â€ the lot of them concluded.

â€œFuck you,â€ said Dr. Coolbad, to the UN.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="peregrine-falcon-baxter-turns-40" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Peregrine Falcon Baxter Turns 40]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Prose

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Today was August 1st, which meant it was his eighth fortieth birthday this year. Coincidentally, it was also his actual birthday. And he wasnâ€™t forty. He was thirty five.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="holy-terrors-1" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Holy Terrors Episode 1]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Screenplay

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Kenta grimaces, ashamed. Rai rolls her eyes. Rosie's face is unreadable.

Watts pries himself off the table, running his hand down his face.

**WATTS**
It's SUNDAY, you little psychopaths, what's WRONG with you?
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="balls-to-the-wall" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Balls to the Wall]]]**
(##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Format: Prose

[[div class="blockquote"]]
And deep in the bowels of the underground top secret facility, on floor 15A, in one of two break rooms affectionately designated The Small One, Dr. Tobias Jay, a distinguished man with graying hair and a cleanly-pressed shirt, huffed spray paint out of a paper bag.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[/tab]]
[[tab Collabs]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="lord-blackwood-in-the-land-of-wonder" limit="1"]]
[[span class="page-header"]]**[[[Lord Blackwood in the Land of Wonder]]]** (##green|+%%rating%%##) (%%comments%% ðŸ’¬)[[/span]]
Written By: [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]
Illustrated By: Me

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Once upon a time there was a brave, intrepid, and handsome explorer.
